info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: Gets all the Azure Firewall FQDN Tags in a subscription.
Gets all the Azure Firewalls in a subscription.
Gets all the Azure Web Categories in a subscription.
Gets the specified Azure Web Category.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the azureWebCategory.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands resourceIds back referenced by the azureWebCategory resource.

get.description: Gets all the Firewall Policies in a subscription.
Lists all Azure Firewalls in a resource group.

parameters.name: azureFirewallName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Firewall.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified Azure Firewall.

parameters.name: azureFirewallName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Firewall.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update Azure Firewall operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Updates tags of an Azure Firewall resource.

parameters.name: azureFirewallName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Firewall.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update azure firewall tags.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: azureFirewallName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Firewall.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Retrieves a list of all IP prefixes that azure firewall has learned to not SNAT.

parameters.name: azureFirewallName

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Retrieves the current status of IDPS signatures for the relevant policy. Maximal amount of returned signatures is 1000.

parameters.name: firewallPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Firewall Policy.

extendedLocation.description: The extended location of type local virtual network gateway.

zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

sourceAddresses.description: List of source IP addresses for this rule.

targetFqdns.description: List of FQDNs for this rule.

fqdnTags.description: List of FQDN Tags for this rule.

sourceIpGroups.description: List of source IpGroups for this rule.

AzureFirewallApplicationRuleProtocol.description: Properties of the application rule protocol.

port.description: Port number for the protocol, cannot be greater than 64000. This field is optional.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Azure firewall FQDN tag resource.

fqdnTagName.description: The name of this FQDN Tag.

AzureFirewallIPConfigurationPropertiesFo.description: Properties of IP configuration of an Azure Firewall.

privateIPAddress.description: The Firewall Internal Load Balancer IP to be used as the next hop in User Defined Routes.

subnet.description: Reference to the subnet resource. This resource must be named 'AzureFirewallSubnet' or 'AzureFirewallManagementSubnet'.

publicIPAddress.description: Reference to the PublicIP resource. This field is a mandatory input if subnet is not null.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Azure firewall IP configuration resource.

AzureFirewallListResult.description: The response of a AzureFirewall list operation.

value.description: The AzureFirewall items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

sourceAddresses.description: List of source IP addresses for this rule.

destinationAddresses.description: List of destination IP addresses for this rule. Supports IP ranges, prefixes, and service tags.

protocols.description: Array of AzureFirewallNetworkRuleProtocols applicable to this NAT rule.

translatedAddress.description: The translated address for this NAT rule.

translatedPort.description: The translated port for this NAT rule.

translatedFqdn.description: The translated FQDN for this NAT rule.

sourceIpGroups.description: List of source IpGroups for this rule.

sourceAddresses.description: List of source IP addresses for this rule.

sourceIpGroups.description: List of source IpGroups for this rule.

destinationIpGroups.description: List of destination IpGroups for this rule.

applicationRuleCollections.description: Collection of application rule collections used by Azure Firewall.

natRuleCollections.description: Collection of NAT rule collections used by Azure Firewall.

networkRuleCollections.description: Collection of network rule collections used by Azure Firewall.

ipConfigurations.description: IP configuration of the Azure Firewall resource.

managementIpConfiguration.description: IP configuration of the Azure Firewall used for management traffic.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Azure firewall resource.

threatIntelMode.description: The operation mode for Threat Intelligence.

virtualHub.description: The virtualHub to which the firewall belongs.

firewallPolicy.description: The firewallPolicy associated with this azure firewall.

additionalProperties.description: The additional properties used to further config this azure firewall.

autoscaleConfiguration.description: Properties to provide a custom autoscale configuration to this azure firewall.

AzureFirewallPublicIPAddress.description: Public IP Address associated with azure firewall.

name.description: Name of an Azure Firewall SKU.

properties.description: Properties of the Azure Web Category.

AzureWebCategoryListResult.description: The response of a AzureWebCategory list operation.

value.description: The AzureWebCategory items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

identity.description: The identity of the firewall policy.

FirewallPolicyIntrusionDetection.description: Configuration for intrusion detection mode and rules.

mode.description: Intrusion detection general state. When attached to a parent policy, the firewall's effective IDPS mode is the stricter mode of the two.

profile.description: IDPS profile name. When attached to a parent policy, the firewall's effective profile is the profile name of the parent policy.

name.description: Name of the bypass traffic rule.

description.description: Description of the bypass traffic rule.

sourceAddresses.description: List of source IP addresses or ranges for this rule.

destinationAddresses.description: List of destination IP addresses or ranges for this rule.

destinationPorts.description: List of destination ports or ranges.

sourceIpGroups.description: List of source IpGroups for this rule.

destinationIpGroups.description: List of destination IpGroups for this rule.

FirewallPolicyIntrusionDetectionConfigur.description: The operation for configuring intrusion detection.

bypassTrafficSettings.description: List of rules for traffic to bypass.

privateRanges.description: IDPS Private IP address ranges are used to identify traffic direction (i.e. inbound, outbound, etc.). By default, only ranges defined by IANA RFC 1918 are considered private IP addresses. To modify default ranges, specify your Private IP address ranges with this property

FirewallPolicyListResult.description: The response of a FirewallPolicy list operation.

value.description: The FirewallPolicy items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

FirewallPolicyRuleCollectionGroupPropert.description: Properties of the rule collection group.

size.description: A read-only string that represents the size of the FirewallPolicyRuleCollectionGroupProperties in MB. (ex 1.2MB)

priority.description: Priority of the Firewall Policy Rule Collection Group resource.

ruleCollections.description: Group of Firewall Policy rule collections.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the firewall policy rule collection group resource.

FirewallPolicySNAT.description: The private IP addresses/IP ranges to which traffic will not be SNAT.

privateRanges.description: List of private IP addresses/IP address ranges to not be SNAT.

autoLearnPrivateRanges.description: The operation mode for automatically learning private ranges to not be SNAT

ipAddresses.description: List of IP addresses for the ThreatIntel Whitelist.

fqdns.description: List of FQDNs for the ThreatIntel Whitelist.

HubIPAddresses.description: IP addresses associated with azure firewall.

publicIPs.description: Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall.

privateIPAddress.description: Private IP Address associated with azure firewall.

HubPublicIPAddresses.description: Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall.

addresses.description: The list of Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall or IP addresses to be retained.

count.description: The number of Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall.
